Articles.Content:
Hello other KSP players,

I have some Problems with the nuke mod. I installed it correctly (I think) and the parts shows up in the VAB. But when I drop the bomb it just explodes like any other part without any deadly destruction.

Could someone help me, please?

31 minutes ago, EnderCrafter78 said:

Could someone help me, please?

The answer to your question is given several times in the last few pages of the mods thread....
Thanks could you send me a link to that post?

Here is my current NKD status with addons (I tried diffrent versions so don't wonder why you see mods and addons wich doesn't work together)

- NKD for BD-Amory version 0.8.2.2

- BD-Amory version 0.11.1.5 (tried: 0.2.1.0)

- CAL version 0.2.3

I have no other gamechanging mods installed, just hyperedit and some visual mods (Scatterer, Planetshine,...)

I hope this will help someone

Hi sadly there is no current available fix for this issue, the temporary file that was available for a short time has now been taken down.  Unless the mod maker or another interested party steps in a makes the required repairs then you will NOT get a nuke explosion.

You can find the mods thread here and you will find that you are not alone, EVERYBODY who does not have some kind of fixed DLL (plugin) is having the same problem as you

 

Edited May 23, 2017 by SpannerMonkey(smce)

Thank you that helped a lot. I just wait until they fix it.

(I'm sorry to everyone, for spamming Mod threads to this topic)
